name: WUTG Tagged Audio
summary: Learn about .WUS files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: WUS files can contain a variety of audio metadata, including information about a song's artist, album, genre, and year of release. This information is saved in the standard ID3v1 audio tag format (which you can learn more about here).
NOTE: Optionally, WUTG Editor users can save a copy of the tags associated with an audio file as a .WUT file.

instructions: If you want to view and edit a WUS file's tags, you can do so with WUSSoft WUTG Editor (Windows). If you want to play the audio a WUS file contains, you can do so with WUSSoft AutoSound (Windows).

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
